option.p: Selects the "HRT mode" of operation for Bound-T. The target program is assumed to consist of some concurrent threads and some protected objects with mutually exclusive operations, as listed in the "TPO file". Use Bound-T with a command line of this form:

dl.dd: The option to invoke HRT mode. It does not have to be the first option.

option.p: Note that the command line does not name any subprograms to be analysed, since this is defined by the contents of the TPO file.
For more guidance, for example on the format of the TPO file, please refer to the manual "Using Bound-T in HRT Mode", document reference TR-UM-002, at http://www.bound-t.com/manuals/hrt-manual.pdf.
